meanings.sent1: The unsated hunger gnawed at his stomach all day.
meanings.sent2: She felt unsated even after finishing the entire meal.
meanings.sent3: The unsated cat kept meowing for more treats.
meanings.sent4: His unsated desire for adventure led him to explore unknown lands.
meanings.sent5: The unsated longing for home made her heart ache.

meanings.sent1: The unsated fire continued to burn out of control.
meanings.sent2: Despite drinking water, his thirst remained unsated.
meanings.sent3: The unsated plant begged for more water by wilting dramatically.
meanings.sent4: Her unsated curiosity drove her to ask endless questions.
meanings.sent5: The unsated need for knowledge fueled his late-night studying.
